name: learning-management-system
description: Comprehensive Learning Management System with E2E testing

scripts.e2e: npm run docker:test && sleep 5 && E2E_BASE_URL=http://localhost:3002 playwright test --project=chromium --reporter=line
scripts.e2e:all: npm run docker:test && sleep 5 && E2E_BASE_URL=http://localhost:3002 playwright test
scripts.e2e:ui: npm run docker:test && sleep 5 && E2E_BASE_URL=http://localhost:3002 playwright test --ui
scripts.e2e:headed: npm run docker:test && sleep 5 && E2E_BASE_URL=http://localhost:3002 playwright test --headed
scripts.e2e:debug: npm run docker:test && sleep 5 && E2E_BASE_URL=http://localhost:3002 playwright test --debug
